name: @MakeLabelTable
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script used to create, modify, and transform label tables

inputs.description: Name of output label table
inputs.name: Label Table

inputs.description: Instead of a label table, produce an atlas point list
inputs.name: Atlas Point List

inputs.description: Define a label with its minimum and maximum key values
inputs.name: Label Range Definition

inputs.description: Define a label and its value
inputs.name: Label Value Definition

inputs.description: Set column delimiter for -lab_file option
inputs.name: Label File Delimiter

inputs.description: Specify labels and keys from a text file
inputs.name: Label File

inputs.description: Allow for another column of long names for regions
inputs.name: Long Names Column Index

inputs.description: Limit long names to nth column
inputs.name: Last Long Name Column Index

inputs.description: Attach the label table (or atlas point list) to dataset
inputs.name: Dataset

inputs.description: Compute center of mass location for each ROI
inputs.name: Centers Flag

inputs.description: Different ways to compute centers (Icent, Dcent, cm)
inputs.name: Center Type

inputs.description: Calculate center of mass locations using a subset of voxels
inputs.name: Center Mask

inputs.description: Skip regions without voxels
inputs.name: Skip No Voxels Flag

inputs.description: Return a listing of all labels
inputs.name: All Labels Flag

inputs.description: Return a listing of all keys
inputs.name: All Keys Flag

inputs.description: Return the keys whose labels match a given label
inputs.name: Label Keys

inputs.description: Return the range (min max) of keys whose labels match a given label
inputs.name: Range Keys

inputs.description: Return the label associated with a given key
inputs.name: Key Label

inputs.description: Return labels matching a given label
inputs.name: Match Label

inputs.description: Dump the labeltable from a dataset
inputs.name: Label Table of Dataset

inputs.description: Use word matching for labels
inputs.name: Word Label Match Flag

inputs.description: Do not give error messages when failing
inputs.name: Quiet Death Flag

inputs.description: Transform Label Table to Atlas Point List
inputs.name: Label Table to Atlas Point List

inputs.description: Get Label Table in dataset and write as an Atlas Point List
inputs.name: Dataset Label Table to Atlas Point List

inputs.description: Transform Label Table to CSV format
inputs.name: Label Table to CSV

inputs.description: Transform a labeled ROI dataset into an atlas
inputs.name: Atlasize Labeled Dataset

inputs.description: Specify the name of the NIML file where atlas attributes are stored
inputs.name: Atlas File

inputs.description: Name of the Atlas
inputs.name: Atlas Name

inputs.description: Description of the Atlas, which appears in AFNI's whereami window
inputs.name: Atlas Description

inputs.description: Replace existing Atlas if the name already exists in the NIML file
inputs.name: Replace Flag

inputs.description: Add an existing atlas to an atlas file
inputs.name: Add Atlas Dataset

inputs.description: Open webpage with help for this program
inputs.name: Help Web

inputs.description: Open -help output in a GUI editor
inputs.name: Help View

inputs.description: List all of the options for this script
inputs.name: All Options

inputs.description: Search for lines containing a specific word in the help output
inputs.name: Help Find

output-files.description: Output CSV file from label table
output-files.name: Output CSV File

output-files.description: Output NIML file after atlasizing labeled dataset
output-files.name: Output NIML Atlas File
